fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.text: Drama Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.text: Crime, Drama An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

fields.title: The Godfather: Part II
fields.text: Crime, Drama The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

fields.title: 12 Angry Men
fields.text: Crime, Drama A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.text: Crime, Drama The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

fields.title: Inception
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

fields.title: Fight Club
fields.text: Drama An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.text: Drama, Romance The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

fields.title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
fields.text: Western A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.text: Action, Sci-Fi When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

fields.title: Goodfellas
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Fantasy After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
fields.text: Drama A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

fields.title: Hamilton
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.

fields.title: Gisaengchung
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Thriller Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

fields.title: Soorarai Pottru
fields.text: Drama Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Sci-Fi A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

fields.title: Cidade de Deus
fields.text: Crime, Drama In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

fields.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Family During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

fields.title: Saving Private Ryan
fields.text: Drama, War Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

fields.title: The Green Mile
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Fantasy The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

fields.title: La vita è bella
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

fields.title: Se7en
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

fields.title: Star Wars
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Fantasy Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

fields.title: Seppuku
fields.text: Action, Drama, Mystery When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

fields.title: Shichinin no samurai
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

fields.title: It's a Wonderful Life
fields.text: Drama, Family, Fantasy An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

fields.title: Joker
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

fields.title: Whiplash
fields.text: Drama, Music A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

fields.title: The Intouchables
fields.text: Biography, Comedy, Drama After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

fields.title: The Prestige
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

fields.title: The Departed
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

fields.title: The Pianist
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Music A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

fields.title: Gladiator
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

fields.title: American History X
fields.text: Drama A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

fields.title: The Usual Suspects
fields.text: Crime, Mystery, Thriller A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

fields.title: Léon
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama Mathilda, a 12-year-old girl, is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

fields.title: The Lion King
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Drama Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

fields.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
fields.text: Action, Sci-Fi A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

fields.title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
fields.text: Drama, Romance A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

fields.title: Hotaru no haka
fields.text: Animation, Drama, War A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

fields.title: Back to the Future
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Sci-Fi Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

fields.title: Once Upon a Time in the West
fields.text: Western A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

fields.title: Psycho
fields.text: Horror, Mystery, Thriller A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

fields.title: Casablanca
fields.text: Drama, Romance, War A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

fields.title: Modern Times
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Family The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

fields.title: City Lights
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

fields.title: Capharnaüm
fields.text: Drama While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

fields.title: Ayla: The Daughter of War
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History In 1950, amid-st the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl, with no parents and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...                See full summary »

fields.title: Vikram Vedha
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama Vikram, a no-nonsense police officer, accompanied by Simon, his partner, is on the hunt to capture Vedha, a smuggler and a murderer. Vedha tries to change Vikram's life, which leads to a conflict.

fields.title: Kimi no na wa.
fields.text: Animation, Drama, Fantasy Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

fields.title: Dangal
fields.text: Action, Biography, Drama Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.

fields.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
fields.text: Animation, Action, Adventure Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

fields.title: Avengers: Endgame
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.

fields.title: Avengers: Infinity War
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

fields.title: Coco
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Family Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.text: Drama, Western With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

fields.title: The Dark Knight Rises
fields.text: Action, Adventure Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

fields.title: 3 Idiots
fields.text: Comedy, Drama Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

fields.title: Taare Zameen Par
fields.text: Drama, Family An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

fields.title: WALL·E
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Family In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

fields.title: The Lives of Others
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Thriller In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

fields.title: Oldeuboi
fields.text: Action, Drama, Mystery After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

fields.title: Memento
fields.text: Mystery, Thriller A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

fields.title: Mononoke-hime
fields.text: Animation, Action, Adventure On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

fields.title: Once Upon a Time in America
fields.text: Crime, Drama A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

fields.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
fields.text: Action, Adventure In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

fields.title: The Shining
fields.text: Drama, Horror A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

fields.title: Apocalypse Now
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, War A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

fields.title: Alien
fields.text: Horror, Sci-Fi After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

fields.title: Anand
fields.text: Drama, Musical The story of a terminally ill man who wishes to live life to the fullest before the inevitable occurs, as told by his best friend.

fields.title: Tengoku to jigoku
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

fields.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
fields.text: Comedy An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

fields.title: Witness for the Prosecution
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

fields.title: Paths of Glory
fields.text: Drama, War After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

fields.title: Rear Window
fields.text: Mystery, Thriller A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

fields.title: Sunset Blvd.
fields.text: Drama, Film-Noir A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

fields.title: The Great Dictator
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, War Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Drama, Thriller, War April 6th, 1917. As a regiment assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

fields.title: Tumbbad
fields.text: Drama, Fantasy, Horror A mythological story about a goddess who created the entire universe. The plot revolves around the consequences when humans build a temple for her first-born.

fields.title: Andhadhun
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Music A series of mysterious events change the life of a blind pianist, who must now report a crime that he should technically know nothing of.

fields.title: Drishyam
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A man goes to extreme lengths to save his family from punishment after the family commits an accidental crime.

fields.title: Jagten
fields.text: Drama A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

fields.title: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
fields.text: Drama A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

fields.title: Incendies
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, War Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

fields.title: Miracle in cell NO.7
fields.text: Drama A story of love between a mentally-ill father who was wrongly accused of murder and his lovely six years old daughter. The prison would be their home. Based on the 2013 Korean movie 7-beon-bang-ui seon-mul (2013).

fields.title: Babam ve Oglum
fields.text: Drama, Family The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

fields.title: Inglourious Basterds
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, War In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

fields.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
fields.text: Drama, Romance, Sci-Fi When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

fields.title: Amélie
fields.text: Comedy, Romance Amélie is an innocent and naive girl in Paris with her own sense of justice. She decides to help those around her and, along the way, discovers love.

fields.title: Snatch
fields.text: Comedy, Crime Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.

fields.title: Requiem for a Dream
fields.text: Drama The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

fields.title: American Beauty
fields.text: Drama A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

fields.title: Good Will Hunting
fields.text: Drama, Romance Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

fields.title: Bacheha-Ye aseman
fields.text: Drama, Family, Sport After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.

fields.title: Toy Story
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

fields.title: Braveheart
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

fields.title: Reservoir Dogs
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller When a simple jewelry heist goes horribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

fields.title: Full Metal Jacket
fields.text: Drama, War A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.

fields.title: Idi i smotri
fields.text: Drama, Thriller, War After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

fields.title: Aliens
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi Fifty-seven years after surviving an apocalyptic attack aboard her space vessel by merciless space creatures, Officer Ripley awakens from hyper-sleep and tries to warn anyone who will listen about the predators.

fields.title: Amadeus
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

fields.title: Scarface
fields.text: Crime, Drama In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Fantasy After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

fields.title: Das Boot
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Thriller The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

fields.title: Taxi Driver
fields.text: Crime, Drama A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

fields.title: The Sting
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

fields.title: A Clockwork Orange
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Sci-Fi In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

fields.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
fields.text: Adventure, Sci-Fi After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

fields.title: Per qualche dollaro in più
fields.text: Western Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

fields.title: Lawrence of Arabia
fields.text: Adventure, Biography, Drama The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

fields.title: The Apartment
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

fields.title: North by Northwest
fields.text: Adventure, Mystery, Thriller A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

fields.title: Vertigo
fields.text: Mystery, Romance, Thriller A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

fields.title: Singin' in the Rain
fields.text: Comedy, Musical, Romance A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

fields.title: Ikiru
fields.text: Drama A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

fields.title: Ladri di biciclette
fields.text: Drama In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

fields.title: Double Indemnity
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Film-Noir An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

fields.title: Citizen Kane
fields.text: Drama, Mystery Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

fields.title: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mörder
fields.text: Crime, Mystery, Thriller When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

fields.title: Metropolis
fields.text: Drama, Sci-Fi In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

fields.title: The Kid
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Family The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

fields.title: Chhichhore
fields.text: Comedy, Drama A tragic incident forces Anirudh, a middle-aged man, to take a trip down memory lane and reminisce his college days along with his friends, who were labelled as losers.

fields.title: Uri: The Surgical Strike
fields.text: Action, Drama, War Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

fields.title: K.G.F: Chapter 1
fields.text: Action, Drama In the 1970s, a fierce rebel rises against brutal oppression and becomes the symbol of hope to legions of downtrodden people.

fields.title: Green Book
fields.text: Biography, Comedy, Drama A working-class Italian-American bouncer becomes the driver of an African-American classical pianist on a tour of venues through the 1960s American South.

fields.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

fields.title: Talvar
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery An experienced investigator confronts several conflicting theories about the perpetrators of a violent double homicide.

fields.title: Baahubali 2: The Conclusion
fields.text: Action, Drama When Shiva, the son of Bahubali, learns about his heritage, he begins to look for answers. His story is juxtaposed with past events that unfolded in the Mahishmati Kingdom.

fields.title: Klaus
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

fields.title: Drishyam
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery Desperate measures are taken by a man who tries to save his family from the dark side of the law, after they commit an unexpected crime.

fields.title: Queen
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Drama A Delhi girl from a traditional family sets out on a solo honeymoon after her marriage gets cancelled.

fields.title: Mandariinid
fields.text: Drama, War In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

fields.title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Sport The truth behind the ascension of Milkha Singh who was scarred because of the India-Pakistan partition.

fields.title: Gangs of Wasseypur
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Crime A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

fields.title: Udaan
fields.text: Drama Expelled from his school, a 16-year old boy returns home to his abusive and oppressive father.

fields.title: Paan Singh Tomar
fields.text: Action, Biography, Crime The story of Paan Singh Tomar, an Indian athlete and seven-time national steeplechase champion who becomes one of the most feared dacoits in Chambal Valley after his retirement.

fields.title: El secreto de sus ojos
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Romance A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

fields.title: Warrior
fields.text: Action, Drama, Sport The youngest son of an alcoholic former boxer returns home, where he's trained by his father for competition in a mixed martial arts tournament - a path that puts the fighter on a collision course with his estranged, older brother.

fields.title: Shutter Island
fields.text: Mystery, Thriller In 1954, a U.S. Marshal investigates the disappearance of a murderer who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane.

fields.title: Up
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

fields.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.

fields.title: Chak De! India
fields.text: Drama, Family, Sport Kabir Khan is the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team and his dream is to make his all girls team emerge victorious against all odds.

fields.title: There Will Be Blood
fields.text: Drama A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

fields.title: Pan's Labyrinth
fields.text: Drama, Fantasy, War In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

fields.title: Toy Story 3
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

fields.title: V for Vendetta
fields.text: Action, Drama, Sci-Fi In a future British tyranny, a shadowy freedom fighter, known only by the alias of "V", plots to overthrow it with the help of a young woman.

fields.title: Rang De Basanti
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama The story of six young Indians who assist an English woman to film a documentary on the freedom fighters from their past, and the events that lead them to relive the long-forgotten saga of freedom.

fields.title: Black
fields.text: Drama The cathartic tale of a young woman who can't see, hear or talk and the teacher who brings a ray of light into her dark world.

fields.title: Batman Begins
fields.text: Action, Adventure After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

fields.title: Swades: We, the People
fields.text: Drama A successful Indian scientist returns to an Indian village to take his nanny to America with him and in the process rediscovers his roots.

fields.title: Der Untergang
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

fields.title: Hauru no ugoku shiro
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Family When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

fields.title: A Beautiful Mind
fields.text: Biography, Drama After John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician, accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn for the nightmarish.

fields.title: Hera Pheri
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Crime Three unemployed men look for answers to all their money problems - but when their opportunity arrives, will they know what to do with it?

fields.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Crime A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.

fields.title: L.A. Confidential
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen - one strait-laced, one brutal, and one sleazy - investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

fields.title: Eskiya
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

fields.title: Heat
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

fields.title: Casino
fields.text: Crime, Drama A tale of greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia enforcer and a casino executive compete against each other over a gambling empire, and over a fast-living and fast-loving socialite.

fields.title: Andaz Apna Apna
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Romance Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become her protectors from an evil criminal.

fields.title: Unforgiven
fields.text: Drama, Western Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

fields.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
fields.text: Action, Adventure In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Professor Henry "Indiana" Jones, Jr. finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

fields.title: Dom za vesanje
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama In this luminous tale set in the area around Sarajevo and in Italy, Perhan, an engaging young Romany (gypsy) with telekinetic powers, is seduced by the quick-cash world of petty crime, which threatens to destroy him and those he loves.

fields.title: Tonari no Totoro
fields.text: Animation, Family, Fantasy When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

fields.title: Die Hard
fields.text: Action, Thriller An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

fields.title: Ran
fields.text: Action, Drama, War In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

fields.title: Raging Bull
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Sport The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.

fields.title: Stalker
fields.text: Drama, Sci-Fi A guide leads two men through an area known as the Zone to find a room that grants wishes.

fields.title: Höstsonaten
fields.text: Drama, Music A married daughter who longs for her mother's love is visited by the latter, a successful concert pianist.

fields.title: The Message
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

fields.title: Sholay
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Comedy After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

fields.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Fantasy King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table embark on a surreal, low-budget search for the Holy Grail, encountering many, very silly obstacles.

fields.title: The Great Escape
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, History Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.text: Crime, Drama Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

fields.title: Yôjinbô
fields.text: Action, Drama, Thriller A crafty ronin comes to a town divided by two criminal gangs and decides to play them against each other to free the town.

fields.title: Judgment at Nuremberg
fields.text: Drama, War In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

fields.title: Some Like It Hot
fields.text: Comedy, Music, Romance After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

fields.title: Smultronstället
fields.text: Drama, Romance After living a life marked by coldness, an aging professor is forced to confront the emptiness of his existence.

fields.title: Det sjunde inseglet
fields.text: Drama, Fantasy, History A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

fields.title: Du rififi chez les hommes
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller Four men plan a technically perfect crime, but the human element intervenes...

fields.title: Dial M for Murder
fields.text: Crime, Thriller A former tennis player tries to arrange his wife's murder after learning of her affair.

fields.title: Tôkyô monogatari
fields.text: Drama An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city, but receive little attention.

fields.title: Rashômon
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery The rape of a bride and the murder of her samurai husband are recalled from the perspectives of a bandit, the bride, the samurai's ghost and a woodcutter.

fields.title: All About Eve

fields.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Western Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

fields.title: To Be or Not to Be
fields.text: Comedy, War During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

fields.title: The Gold Rush
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Drama A prospector goes to the Klondike in search of gold and finds it and more.

fields.title: Sherlock Jr.
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Romance A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

fields.title: Portrait de la jeune fille en feu
fields.text: Drama, Romance On an isolated island in Brittany at the end of the eighteenth century, a female painter is obliged to paint a wedding portrait of a young woman.

fields.title: Pink
fields.text: Drama, Thriller When three young women are implicated in a crime, a retired lawyer steps forward to help them clear their names.

fields.title: Koe no katachi
fields.text: Animation, Drama, Family A young man is ostracized by his classmates after he bullies a deaf girl to the point where she moves away. Years later, he sets off on a path for redemption.

fields.title: Contratiempo
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery A successful entrepreneur accused of murder and a witness preparation expert have less than three hours to come up with an impregnable defense.

fields.title: Ah-ga-ssi
fields.text: Drama, Romance, Thriller A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

fields.title: Mommy

fields.title: Haider
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama A young man returns to Kashmir after his father's disappearance to confront his uncle, whom he suspects of playing a role in his father's fate.

fields.title: Logan
fields.text: Action, Drama, Sci-Fi In a future where mutants are nearly extinct, an elderly and weary Logan leads a quiet life. But when Laura, a mutant child pursued by scientists, comes to him for help, he must get her to safety.

fields.title: Room
fields.text: Drama, Thriller Held captive for 7 years in an enclosed space, a woman and her young son finally gain their freedom, allowing the boy to experience the outside world for the first time.

fields.title: Relatos salvajes
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Thriller Six short stories that explore the extremities of human behavior involving people in distress.

fields.title: Soul
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

fields.title: Kis Uykusu
fields.text: Drama A hotel owner and landlord in a remote Turkish village deals with conflicts within his family and a tenant behind on his rent.

fields.title: PK
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Musical An alien on Earth loses the only device he can use to communicate with his spaceship. His innocent nature and child-like questions force the country to evaluate the impact of religion on its people.

fields.title: OMG: Oh My God!

fields.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel

fields.title: Gone Girl

fields.title: Ôkami kodomo no Ame to Yuki

fields.title: Hacksaw Ridge

fields.title: Inside Out

fields.title: Barfi!
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance Three young people learn that love can neither be defined nor contained by society's definition of normal and abnormal.

fields.title: 12 Years a Slave
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.

fields.title: Rush
fields.text: Action, Biography, Drama The merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.

fields.title: Ford v Ferrari
fields.text: Action, Biography, Drama American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

fields.title: Spotlight

fields.title: Song of the Sea

fields.title: Kahaani

fields.title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara

fields.title: Prisoners
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

fields.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a woman rebels against a tyrannical ruler in search for her homeland with the aid of a group of female prisoners, a psychotic worshiper, and a drifter named Max.

fields.title: A Wednesday

fields.title: Gran Torino

fields.title: Okuribito

fields.title: Hachi: A Dog's Tale

fields.title: Mary and Max
fields.text: Animation, Comedy, Drama A tale of friendship between two unlikely pen pals: Mary, a lonely, eight-year-old girl living in the suburbs of Melbourne, and Max, a forty-four-year old, severely obese man living in New York.

fields.title: How to Train Your Dragon

fields.title: Into the Wild

Along the way, Christopher encounters a series of characters that shape his life.

fields.title: No Country for Old Men
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

fields.title: Lage Raho Munna Bhai
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance Munna Bhai embarks on a journey with Mahatma Gandhi in order to fight against a corrupt property dealer.

fields.title: Million Dollar Baby
fields.text: Drama, Sport A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.

fields.title: Hotel Rwanda
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

fields.title: Taegukgi hwinalrimyeo
fields.text: Action, Drama, War When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.

fields.title: Before Sunset
fields.text: Drama, Romance Nine years after Jesse and Celine first met, they encounter each other again on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.

fields.title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Musical A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor.

fields.title: Salinui chueok
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery In a small Korean province in 1986, two detectives struggle with the case of multiple young women being found raped and murdered by an unknown culprit.

fields.title: Dil Chahta Hai

fields.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1

fields.title: Finding Nemo

fields.title: Catch Me If You Can

fields.title: Amores perros
fields.text: Drama, Thriller A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.

fields.title: Monsters, Inc.
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, 2 monsters realize things may not be what they think.

fields.title: Shin seiki Evangelion Gekijô-ban: Air/Magokoro wo, kimi ni
fields.text: Animation, Action, Drama Concurrent theatrical ending of the TV series Shin seiki evangerion (1995).

fields.title: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Musical The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

fields.title: The Sixth Sense
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Thriller A boy who communicates with spirits seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

fields.title: La leggenda del pianista sull'oceano
fields.text: Drama, Music, Romance A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.

fields.title: The Truman Show
fields.text: Comedy, Drama An insurance salesman discovers his whole life is actually a reality TV show.

fields.title: Crna macka, beli macor

fields.title: The Big Lebowski

fields.title: Fa yeung nin wah

fields.title: Trainspotting

fields.title: Fargo

fields.title: Underground

fields.title: La haine
fields.text: Crime, Drama 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

fields.title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
fields.text: Drama, Romance When Raj meets Simran in Europe, it isn't love at first sight but when Simran moves to India for an arranged marriage, love makes its presence felt.

fields.title: Before Sunrise
fields.text: Drama, Romance A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.

fields.title: Trois couleurs: Rouge
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Romance A model discovers a retired judge is keen on invading people's privacy.

fields.title: Chung Hing sam lam
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama Two melancholy Hong Kong policemen fall in love: one with a mysterious female underworld figure, the other with a beautiful and ethereal server at a late-night restaurant he frequents.

fields.title: Jurassic Park

fields.title: In the Name of the Father

fields.title: Ba wang bie ji

fields.title: Dà hóng denglong gaogao guà
fields.text: Drama, History, Romance A young woman becomes the fourth wife of a wealthy lord, and must learn to live with the strict rules and tensions within the household.

fields.title: Dead Poets Society

fields.title: Stand by Me
fields.text: Adventure, Drama After the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

fields.title: Platoon

fields.title: Kaze no tani no Naushika
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Fantasy Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

fields.title: The Thing
fields.text: Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi A research team in Antarctica is hunted by a shape-shifting alien that assumes the appearance of its victims.

fields.title: Pink Floyd: The Wall

fields.title: Fitzcarraldo
fields.text: Adventure, Drama The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

fields.title: Fanny och Alexander
fields.text: Drama Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.

fields.title: Blade Runner

fields.title: The Elephant Man

fields.title: Life of Brian
fields.text: Comedy Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

fields.title: The Deer Hunter
fields.text: Drama, War An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

fields.title: Rocky
fields.text: Drama, Sport A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

fields.title: Network
fields.text: Drama A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.

fields.title: Barry Lyndon
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, History An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

fields.title: Zerkalo
fields.text: Biography, Drama A dying man in his forties remembers his past. His childhood, his mother, the war, personal moments and things that tell of the recent history of all the Russian nation.

fields.title: Chinatown
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Thriller A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.

fields.title: Paper Moon

fields.title: Viskningar och rop
fields.text: Drama When a woman dying of cancer in early twentieth-century Sweden is visited by her two sisters, long-repressed feelings between the siblings rise to the surface.

fields.title: Solaris
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi A psychologist is sent to a station orbiting a distant planet in order to discover what has caused the crew to go insane.

fields.title: Le samouraï
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

fields.title: Cool Hand Luke
fields.text: Crime, Drama A laid back Southern man is sentenced to two years in a rural prison, but refuses to conform.

fields.title: Persona
fields.text: Drama, Thriller A nurse is put in charge of a mute actress and finds that their personae are melding together.

fields.title: Andrei Rublev
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History The life, times and afflictions of the fifteenth-century Russian iconographer St. Andrei Rublev.

fields.title: La battaglia di Algeri
fields.text: Drama, War In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

fields.title: El ángel exterminador
fields.text: Drama, Fantasy The guests at an upper-class dinner party find themselves unable to leave.

fields.title: What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
fields.text: Drama, Horror, Thriller A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

fields.title: Sanjuro
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Crime A crafty samurai helps a young man and his fellow clansmen save his uncle, who has been framed and imprisoned by a corrupt superintendent.

fields.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
fields.text: Drama, Western A senator returns to a western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

fields.title: Ivanovo detstvo
fields.text: Drama, War In WW2, twelve year old Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev works for the Soviet army as a scout behind the German lines and strikes a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers.

fields.title: Jungfrukällan
fields.text: Drama An innocent yet pampered young virgin and her family's pregnant and jealous servant set out to deliver candles to church, but only one returns from events that transpire in the woods along the way.

fields.title: Inherit the Wind
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History Based on a real-life case in 1925, two great lawyers argue the case for and against a science teacher accused of the crime of teaching evolution.

fields.title: Les quatre cents coups

fields.title: Ben-Hur
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, History After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

fields.title: Kakushi-toride no san-akunin
fields.text: Adventure, Drama Lured by gold, two greedy peasants unknowingly escort a princess and her general across enemy lines.

fields.title: Le notti di Cabiria

fields.title: Kumonosu-jô

fields.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai

fields.title: On the Waterfront
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

fields.title: Le salaire de la peur
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Thriller In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

fields.title: Ace in the Hole
fields.text: Drama, Film-Noir A frustrated former big-city journalist now stuck working for an Albuquerque newspaper exploits a story about a man trapped in a cave to rekindle his career, but the situation quickly escalates into an out-of-control circus.

fields.title: White Heat

fields.title: The Third Man

fields.title: The Red Shoes

The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.

fields.title: Wonder

fields.title: La Strada

fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama A detective investigates the death of a patriarch of an eccentric, combative family.

fields.title: Dil Bechara
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

fields.title: Manbiki kazoku
fields.text: Crime, Drama A family of small-time crooks take in a child they find outside in the cold.

fields.title: Marriage Story
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance Noah Baumbach's incisive and compassionate look at a marriage breaking up and a family staying together.

fields.title: Call Me by Your Name
fields.text: Drama, Romance In 1980s Italy, romance blossoms between a seventeen-year-old student and the older man hired as his father's research assistant.

fields.title: I, Daniel Blake
fields.text: Drama After having suffered a heart-attack, a 59-year-old carpenter must fight the bureaucratic forces of the system in order to receive Employment and Support Allowance.

fields.title: Isle of Dogs
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy Set in Japan, Isle of Dogs follows a boy's odyssey in search of his lost dog.

fields.title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Drama A national manhunt is ordered for a rebellious kid and his foster uncle who go missing in the wild New Zealand bush.

fields.title: Captain Fantastic
fields.text: Comedy, Drama In the forests of the Pacific Northwest, a father devoted to raising his six kids with a rigorous physical and intellectual education is forced to leave his paradise and enter the world, challenging his idea of what it means to be a parent.

fields.title: Sing Street

fields.title: Thor: Ragnarok
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Comedy Imprisoned on the planet Sakaar, Thor must race against time to return to Asgard and stop Ragnarök, the destruction of his world, at the hands of the powerful and ruthless villain Hela.

fields.title: Nightcrawler
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller When Louis Bloom, a con man desperate for work, muscles into the world of L.A. crime journalism, he blurs the line between observer and participant to become the star of his own story.

fields.title: Jojo Rabbit

fields.title: Arrival

fields.title: Star Wars: Episode VII - The Force Awakens
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi As a new threat to the galaxy rises, Rey, a desert scavenger, and Finn, an ex-stormtrooper, must join Han Solo and Chewbacca to search for the one hope of restoring peace.

fields.title: Before Midnight
fields.text: Drama, Romance We meet Jesse and Celine nine years on in Greece. Almost two decades have passed since their first meeting on that train bound for Vienna.

fields.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

fields.title: Bir Zamanlar Anadolu'da
fields.text: Crime, Drama A group of men set out in search of a dead body in the Anatolian steppes.

fields.title: The Artist
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

fields.title: Edge of Tomorrow
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi A soldier fighting aliens gets to relive the same day over and over again, the day restarting every time he dies.

fields.title: Amour
fields.text: Drama, Romance Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.

fields.title: The Irishman
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama An old man recalls his time painting houses for his friend, Jimmy Hoffa, through the 1950-70s.

fields.title: Un prophète
fields.text: Crime, Drama A young Arab man is sent to a French prison.

fields.title: Moon
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

fields.text: Crime, Drama, Fantasy Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

fields.title: District 9
fields.text: Action, Sci-Fi, Thriller Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

fields.title: The Wrestler
fields.text: Drama, Sport A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

fields.title: Jab We Met
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance A depressed wealthy businessman finds his life changing after he meets a spunky and care-free young woman.

fields.title: Boyhood
fields.text: Drama The life of Mason, from early childhood to his arrival at college.

fields.title: 4 luni, 3 saptamâni si 2 zile
fields.text: Drama A woman assists her friend in arranging an illegal abortion in 1980s Romania.

fields.title: Star Trek
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

fields.title: The Man from Earth

fields.title: Letters from Iwo Jima

fields.title: The Fall

Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

fields.title: Life of Pi
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy A young man who survives a disaster at sea is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While cast away, he forms an unexpected connection with another survivor: a fearsome Bengal tiger.

fields.title: Fantastic Mr. Fox

fields.title: C.R.A.Z.Y.

fields.title: Les choristes
fields.text: Drama, Music The new teacher at a severely administered boys' boarding school works to positively affect the students' lives through music.

fields.title: Iron Man
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.

fields.title: Shaun of the Dead
fields.text: Comedy, Horror A man's uneventful life is disrupted by the zombie apocalypse.

fields.title: Gegen die Wand

fields.title: Mystic River

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

fields.title: Hable con ella

fields.title: No Man's Land

fields.title: Cowboy Bebop: Tengoku no tobira

fields.title: The Bourne Identity
fields.text: Action, Mystery, Thriller A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.

fields.title: Nueve reinas

fields.title: Children of Men
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Sci-Fi In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

fields.title: Almost Famous

fields.title: Mulholland Dr.

fields.title: Boogie Nights

fields.title: Mimi wo sumaseba
fields.text: Animation, Drama, Family A love story between a girl who loves reading books, and a boy who has previously checked out all of the library books she chooses.

fields.title: Once Were Warriors

fields.title: True Romance

fields.title: Trois couleurs: Bleu

fields.title: Jûbê ninpûchô

fields.title: Brazil

fields.title: This Is Spinal Tap

fields.title: A Christmas Story

fields.title: The Blues Brothers
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Comedy Jake Blues, just released from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and his brother Elwood were raised.

fields.title: Manhattan
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance The life of a divorced television writer dating a teenage girl is further complicated when he falls in love with his best friend's mistress.

fields.title: All That Jazz

fields.title: La montaña sagrada
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a messianic character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

fields.title: Amarcord

fields.title: Le charme discret de la bourgeoisie

fields.title: Aguirre, der Zorn Gottes

fields.title: Harold and Maude

fields.title: The Manchurian Candidate

fields.title: Spartacus

fields.title: L'avventura

fields.title: Hiroshima mon amour

fields.title: The Ten Commandments
fields.text: Adventure, Drama Moses, an Egyptian Prince, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

fields.title: The Searchers
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Western An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.

fields.title: East of Eden

fields.title: High Noon

fields.title: Strangers on a Train

fields.title: The Philadelphia Story
fields.text: Comedy, Romance When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.

fields.title: His Girl Friday
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance A newspaper editor uses every trick in the book to keep his ace reporter ex-wife from remarrying.

fields.title: The Adventures of Robin Hood

fields.title: Nosferatu

fields.title: The Gentlemen

fields.title: Raazi

fields.title: Sound of Metal

fields.title: Forushande

fields.title: Hidden Figures
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History The story of a team of female African-American mathematicians who served a vital role in NASA during the early years of the U.S. space program.

fields.title: Udta Punjab

fields.title: Kubo and the Two Strings

fields.title: M.S. Dhoni: The Untold Story

fields.title: Under sandet

fields.title: Rogue One
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi The daughter of an Imperial scientist joins the Rebel Alliance in a risky move to steal the plans for the Death Star.

fields.title: Captain America: Civil War

fields.title: The Hateful Eight
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.

fields.title: Little Women

fields.title: Loving Vincent

fields.title: Le passé

fields.title: La grande bellezza

fields.title: The Lunchbox

fields.title: Vicky Donor

fields.title: Big Hero 6

fields.title: About Time

fields.title: English Vinglish

fields.title: Kaze tachinu

fields.title: Toy Story 4

fields.title: La migliore offerta

fields.title: Moonrise Kingdom
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out to find them.

fields.title: How to Train Your Dragon 2

fields.title: The Big Short

fields.title: Kokuhaku

fields.title: Ang-ma-reul bo-at-da
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

fields.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

fields.title: Captain Phillips
fields.text: Adventure, Biography, Crime The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the U.S.-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.

fields.title: Ajeossi

fields.title: Straight Outta Compton

fields.title: Madeo

fields.title: Chugyeokja

fields.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug

fields.title: Das weiße Band - Eine deutsche Kindergeschichte
fields.text: Drama, History, Mystery Strange events happen in a small village in the north of Germany during the years before World War I, which seem to be ritual punishment. Who is responsible?

fields.title: Män som hatar kvinnor

fields.title: The Trial of the Chicago 7

fields.title: Druk

fields.title: The Fighter
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Sport Based on the story of Micky Ward, a fledgling boxer who tries to escape the shadow of his more famous but troubled older boxing brother and get his own shot at greatness.

fields.title: Taken
fields.text: Action, Thriller A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.

fields.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
fields.text: Drama, History, War Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.

fields.title: Once
fields.text: Drama, Music, Romance A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

fields.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
fields.text: Adventure, Fantasy A reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of dwarves to reclaim their mountain home, and the gold within it from the dragon Smaug.

fields.title: Auf der anderen Seite
fields.text: Drama A Turkish man travels to Istanbul to find the daughter of his father's former girlfriend.

fields.title: Atonement
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Romance Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

fields.title: Drive
fields.text: Crime, Drama A mysterious Hollywood stuntman and mechanic moonlights as a getaway driver and finds himself in trouble when he helps out his neighbor.

fields.title: American Gangster
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

fields.title: Avatar
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Fantasy A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

fields.title: Mr. Nobody
fields.text: Drama, Fantasy, Romance A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? Infinite possibilities arise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.

fields.title: Apocalypto
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama As the Mayan kingdom faces its decline, a young man is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression.

fields.title: Little Miss Sunshine
fields.text: Comedy, Drama A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

fields.title: Hot Fuzz
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Mystery A skilled London police officer is transferred to a small town with a dark secret.

fields.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
fields.text: Drama, Fantasy, Romance Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with consequences.

fields.title: Veer-Zaara
fields.text: Drama, Family, Musical Veer-Zaara is a saga of love, separation, courage and sacrifice. A love story that is an inspiration and will remain a legend forever.

fields.title: Adams æbler
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama A neo-nazi sentenced to community service at a church clashes with the blindly devotional priest.

fields.title: Pride & Prejudice
fields.text: Drama, Romance Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?

fields.title: The World's Fastest Indian
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Sport The story of New Zealander Burt Munro, who spent years rebuilding a 1920 Indian motorcycle, which helped him set the land speed world record at Utah's Bonneville Salt Flats in 1967.

fields.title: Tôkyô goddofâzâzu
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy On Christmas Eve, three homeless people living on the streets of Tokyo discover a newborn baby among the trash and set out to find its parents.

fields.title: Serenity
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi The crew of the ship Serenity try to evade an assassin sent to recapture one of their members who is telepathic.

fields.title: Walk the Line
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Music A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis, and Carl Perkins.

fields.title: Ondskan
fields.text: Drama A teenage boy expelled from school for fighting arrives at a boarding school where the systematic bullying of younger students is encouraged as a means to maintain discipline, and decides to fight back.

fields.title: The Notebook
fields.text: Drama, Romance A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman, giving her a sense of freedom, but they are soon separated because of their social differences.

fields.title: Diarios de motocicleta
fields.text: Adventure, Biography, Drama The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.

fields.title: Lilja 4-ever

fields.title: Les triplettes de Belleville
fields.text: Animation, Comedy, Drama When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

fields.title: Gongdong gyeongbi guyeok JSA
fields.text: Action, Drama, Thriller After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.

fields.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous "friend", escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

fields.title: Waking Life
fields.text: Animation, Drama, Fantasy A man shuffles through a dream meeting various people and discussing the meanings and purposes of the universe.

fields.title: Remember the Titans
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Sport The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

fields.title: Wo hu cang long

fields.title: Todo sobre mi madre
fields.text: Drama Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his second mother, a trans woman, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.

fields.title: Cast Away
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Romance A FedEx executive undergoes a physical and emotional transformation after crash landing on a deserted island.

fields.title: The Boondock Saints
fields.text: Action, Crime, Thriller Two Irish Catholic brothers become vigilantes and wipe out Boston's criminal underworld in the name of God.

fields.title: The Insider
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Thriller A research chemist comes under personal and professional attack when he decides to appear in a 60 Minutes exposé on Big Tobacco.

fields.title: October Sky
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Family The true story of Homer Hickam, a coal miner's son who was inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

fields.title: Shrek
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

fields.title: Titanic

fields.title: Gattaca
fields.text: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

fields.title: The Game
fields.text: Action, Drama, Mystery After a wealthy banker is given an opportunity to participate in a mysterious game, his life is turned upside down when he becomes unable to distinguish between the game and reality.

fields.title: Breaking the Waves
fields.text: Drama Oilman Jan is paralyzed in an accident. His wife, who prayed for his return, feels guilty; even more, when Jan urges her to have sex with another.

fields.title: Ed Wood
fields.text: Biography, Comedy, Drama Ambitious but troubled movie director Edward D. Wood Jr. tries his best to fulfill his dreams, despite his lack of talent.

fields.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape

fields.title: Tombstone

fields.title: The Sandlot

fields.title: The Remains of the Day

fields.title: Naked
fields.text: Comedy, Drama Parallel tales of two sexually obsessed men, one hurting and annoying women physically and mentally, one wandering around the city talking to strangers and experiencing dimensions of life.

fields.title: The Fugitive
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.

fields.title: A Bronx Tale

fields.title: Batman: Mask of the Phantasm
fields.text: Animation, Action, Crime Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.

fields.title: Lat sau san taam
fields.text: Action, Crime, Thriller A tough-as-nails cop teams up with an undercover agent to shut down a sinister mobster and his crew.

fields.title: La double vie de Véronique

fields.title: Boyz n the Hood

fields.title: Misery

fields.title: Majo no takkyûbin

fields.title: Dip huet seung hung
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.
