fields.title: Predator
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

fields.title: Evil Dead II
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Fantasy The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

fields.title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
fields.text: Comedy A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

fields.title: Down by Law
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama Two men are framed and sent to jail, where they meet a murderer who helps them escape and leave the state.

fields.title: The Goonies
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Family A group of young misfits called The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on an adventure to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

fields.title: The Color Purple
fields.text: Drama A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

fields.title: The Breakfast Club
fields.text: Comedy, Drama Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

fields.title: The Killing Fields

fields.title: The Right Stuff
fields.text: Adventure, Biography, Drama The story of the original Mercury 7 astronauts and their macho, seat-of-the-pants approach to the space program.

fields.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

fields.title: Days of Heaven

fields.title: The Outlaw Josey Wales

fields.title: The Conversation

fields.title: La planète sauvage
fields.text: Animation, Sci-Fi On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

fields.title: The Day of the Jackal
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

fields.title: Badlands

fields.title: Cabaret

fields.title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory

fields.title: Midnight Cowboy

fields.title: Wait Until Dark

fields.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner

fields.title: Bonnie and Clyde
fields.text: Action, Biography, Crime Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.

fields.title: My Fair Lady

fields.title: Mary Poppins

fields.title: The Longest Day

fields.title: Jules et Jim
fields.text: Drama, Romance Decades of a love triangle concerning two friends and an impulsive woman.

fields.title: The Innocents

fields.title: Red River

fields.title: Key Largo
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama A man visits his war buddy's family hotel and finds a gangster running things. As a hurricane approaches, the two end up confronting each other.

fields.title: To Have and Have Not

fields.title: Shadow of a Doubt
fields.text: Film-Noir, Thriller A young girl, overjoyed when her favorite uncle comes to visit the family, slowly begins to suspect that he is in fact the "Merry Widow" killer sought by the authorities.

fields.title: Stagecoach

fields.title: The Lady Vanishes

fields.title: Bringing Up Baby
fields.text: Comedy, Family, Romance While trying to secure a $1 million donation for his museum, a befuddled paleontologist is pursued by a flighty and often irritating heiress and her pet leopard, Baby.

fields.title: Bride of Frankenstein
fields.text: Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

fields.title: Duck Soup

fields.title: Scarface: The Shame of the Nation
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama An ambitious and nearly insane violent gangster climbs the ladder of success in the mob, but his weaknesses prove to be his downfall.

fields.title: Frankenstein
fields.text: Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi Dr. Frankenstein dares to tamper with life and death by creating a human monster out of lifeless body parts.

fields.title: Roma

fields.title: God's Own Country

fields.title: Wind River

fields.title: Get Out

fields.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout

fields.title: En man som heter Ove
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing block association rules and visiting his wife's grave, has finally given up on life just as an unlikely friendship develops with his boisterous new neighbors.

fields.title: What We Do in the Shadows

fields.title: Omoide no Mânî
fields.text: Animation, Drama, Family Due to 12 y.o. Anna's asthma, she's sent to stay with relatives of her guardian in the Japanese countryside. She likes to be alone, sketching. She befriends Marnie. Who is the mysterious, blonde Marnie.

fields.title: The Theory of Everything
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Romance A look at the relationship between the famous physicist Stephen Hawking and his wife.

fields.title: Kingsman: The Secret Service
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Comedy A spy organisation recruits a promising street kid into the agency's training program, while a global threat emerges from a twisted tech genius.

fields.title: The Fault in Our Stars

fields.title: Me and Earl and the Dying Girl
fields.text: Comedy, Drama High schooler Greg, who spends most of his time making parodies of classic movies with his co-worker Earl, finds his outlook forever altered after befriending a classmate who has just been diagnosed with cancer.

fields.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
fields.text: Comedy, Drama A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

fields.title: La vie d'Adèle

In front of others, Adèle grows, seeks herself, loses herself, and ultimately finds herself through love and loss.

fields.title: Kai po che!

fields.title: The Broken Circle Breakdown
fields.text: Drama, Music, Romance Elise and Didier fall in love at first sight, in spite of their differences. He talks, she listens. He's a romantic atheist, she's a religious realist. When their daughter becomes seriously ill, their love is put on trial.

fields.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier

fields.title: Rockstar
fields.text: Drama, Music, Musical Janardhan Jakhar chases his dreams of becoming a big Rock star, during which he falls in love with Heer.

fields.title: Nebraska
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Drama An aging, booze-addled father makes the trip from Montana to Nebraska with his estranged son in order to claim a million-dollar Mega Sweepstakes Marketing prize.

fields.title: Wreck-It Ralph

fields.title: Le Petit Prince

fields.title: Detachment

fields.title: Midnight in Paris
fields.text: Comedy, Fantasy, Romance While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.

fields.title: The Lego Movie
fields.text: Animation, Action, Adventure An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

fields.title: Gravity
fields.text: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

fields.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.

fields.title: Beasts of No Nation

fields.title: The Social Network
fields.text: Biography, Drama As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

fields.title: X: First Class
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

fields.title: The Hangover

fields.title: Skyfall

fields.title: Silver Linings Playbook

fields.title: Argo

fields.title: (500) Days of Summer

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
fields.text: Adventure, Family, Fantasy As Harry, Ron, and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

fields.title: Gake no ue no Ponyo

fields.title: Frost/Nixon
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

fields.title: Papurika
fields.text: Animation, Drama, Fantasy When a machine that allows therapists to enter their patients' dreams is stolen, all Hell breaks loose. Only a young female therapist, Paprika, can stop it.

fields.title: Changeling
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama Grief-stricken mother Christine Collins (Angelina Jolie) takes on the L.A.P.D. to her own detriment when it tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.

fields.title: Flipped
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance Two eighth-graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites.

fields.title: Toki o kakeru shôjo
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy A high-school girl named Makoto acquires the power to travel back in time, and decides to use it for her own personal benefits. Little does she know that she is affecting the lives of others just as much as she is her own.

fields.title: Death Note: Desu nôto

fields.title: This Is England

fields.title: Ex Machina

fields.title: Efter brylluppet
fields.text: Drama A manager of an orphanage in India is sent to Copenhagen, Denmark, where he discovers a life-altering family secret.

fields.title: The Last King of Scotland
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s.

fields.title: Zodiac
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Mystery In the late 1960s/early 1970s, a San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac Killer, an unidentified individual who terrorizes Northern California with a killing spree.

fields.title: Lucky Number Slevin
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses. Under constant surveillance by Detective Brikowski and assassin Goodkat, he must get them before they get him.

fields.title: Joyeux Noël
fields.text: Drama, History, Music In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

fields.title: Control
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Music A profile of Ian Curtis, the enigmatic singer of Joy Division whose personal, professional, and romantic troubles led him to commit suicide at the age of 23.

fields.title: Tangled
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Comedy The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.

fields.title: Zwartboek
fields.text: Drama, Thriller, War In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.

fields.title: Brokeback Mountain
fields.text: Drama, Romance The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys, and their lives over the years.

fields.title: 3:10 to Yuma
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

fields.title: Crash
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller Los Angeles citizens with vastly separate lives collide in interweaving stories of race, loss and redemption.

fields.title: Kung fu
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Fantasy In Shanghai, China in the 1940s, a wannabe gangster aspires to join the notorious "Axe Gang" while residents of a housing complex exhibit extraordinary powers in defending their turf.

fields.title: The Bourne Supremacy
fields.text: Action, Mystery, Thriller When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

fields.title: The Machinist
fields.text: Drama, Thriller An industrial worker who hasn't slept in a year begins to doubt his own sanity.

fields.title: Ray
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Music The story of the life and career of the legendary rhythm and blues musician Ray Charles, from his humble beginnings in the South, where he went blind at age seven, to his meteoric rise to stardom during the 1950s and 1960s.

fields.title: Lost in Translation
fields.text: Comedy, Drama A faded movie star and a neglected young woman form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
fields.text: Adventure, Family, Fantasy Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

fields.title: Man on Fire
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama In Mexico City, a former CIA operative swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.

fields.title: Coraline

fields.title: The Last Samurai

fields.title: The Magdalene Sisters
fields.text: Drama Three young Irish women struggle to maintain their spirits while they endure dehumanizing abuse as inmates of a Magdalene Sisters Asylum.

fields.title: Good Bye Lenin!
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.

fields.title: In America

fields.title: I Am Sam

fields.title: Adaptation.
fields.text: Comedy, Drama A lovelorn screenwriter becomes desperate as he tries and fails to adapt 'The Orchid Thief' by Susan Orlean for the screen.

fields.title: Black Hawk Down

fields.title: Road to Perdition

fields.title: Das Experiment
fields.text: Drama, Thriller For two weeks, 20 male participants are hired to play prisoners and guards in a prison. The "prisoners" have to follow seemingly mild rules, and the "guards" are told to retain order without using physical violence.

fields.title: Billy Elliot

fields.title: Hedwig and the Angry Inch

fields.title: Ocean's Eleven

fields.title: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust
fields.text: Animation, Action, Fantasy When a girl is abducted by a vampire, a legendary bounty hunter is hired to bring her back.

fields.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?

fields.title: South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut
fields.text: Animation, Comedy, Fantasy When Stan Marsh and his friends go see an R-rated movie, they start cursing and their parents think that Canada is to blame.

fields.title: Office Space
fields.text: Comedy Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

fields.title: Happiness
fields.text: Comedy, Drama The lives of several individuals intertwine as they go about their lives in their own unique ways, engaging in acts society as a whole might find disturbing in a desperate search for human connection.

fields.title: Training Day
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective who isn't what he appears to be.

fields.title: Rushmore
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance The extracurricular king of Rushmore Preparatory School is put on academic probation.

fields.title: Abre los ojos
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Sci-Fi A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.

fields.title: Being John Malkovich

fields.title: As Good as It Gets

fields.title: The Fifth Element
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr. Zorg at bay.

fields.title: Le dîner de cons

fields.title: Donnie Brasco

fields.title: Shine

fields.title: Primal Fear

fields.title: Hamlet

fields.title: A Little Princess

fields.title: Do lok tin si

fields.title: Clerks

fields.title: Short Cuts
fields.text: Comedy, Drama The day-to-day lives of several suburban Los Angeles residents.

fields.title: Philadelphia

fields.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol

fields.title: Malcolm X

fields.title: Kurenai no buta

fields.title: Glengarry Glen Ross

fields.title: A Few Good Men

fields.title: Barton Fink

fields.title: Miller's Crossing

fields.title: Withnail & I

fields.title: The Last Emperor
fields.text: Biography, Drama, History The story of the final Emperor of China.

fields.title: Empire of the Sun
fields.text: Action, Drama, History A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation during World War II.

fields.title: Der Name der Rose

fields.title: Blue Velvet

fields.title: The Purple Rose of Cairo

fields.title: After Hours

fields.title: Zelig
fields.text: Comedy "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.

fields.title: The Verdict

fields.title: Airplane!

fields.title: Rupan sansei: Kariosutoro no shiro

fields.title: Le locataire

fields.title: Serpico

fields.title: Enter the Dragon

fields.title: The Odd Couple

fields.title: Belle de jour

fields.title: Repulsion

fields.title: Zulu

fields.title: Goldfinger

fields.title: Cape Fear

fields.title: Peeping Tom
fields.text: Drama, Horror, Thriller A young man murders women, using a movie camera to film their dying expressions of terror.

fields.title: The Magnificent Seven

fields.title: Les yeux sans visage

fields.title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers

fields.title: Rebel Without a Cause

fields.title: The Ladykillers

fields.title: Sabrina

fields.title: The Quiet Man

fields.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
fields.text: Drama, Sci-Fi An alien lands and tells the people of Earth that they must live peacefully or be destroyed as a danger to other planets.

fields.title: The African Queen

fields.title: Gilda

fields.title: Fantasia

fields.title: The Invisible Man
fields.text: Horror, Sci-Fi A scientist finds a way of becoming invisible, but in doing so, he becomes murderously insane.

fields.title: Dark Waters

fields.title: Just Mercy
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama World-renowned civil rights defense attorney Bryan Stevenson works to free a wrongly condemned death row prisoner.

fields.title: Gifted
fields.text: Drama Frank, a single man raising his child prodigy niece Mary, is drawn into a custody battle with his mother.

fields.title: The Peanut Butter Falcon
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Drama Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.

fields.title: Victoria
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Romance A young Spanish woman who has recently moved to Berlin finds her flirtation with a local guy turn potentially deadly as their night out with his friends reveals a dangerous secret.

fields.title: Mustang

fields.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2

fields.title: Baby Driver
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver finds himself taking part in a heist doomed to fail.

fields.title: Only the Brave

fields.title: Bridge of Spies

fields.title: Creed

fields.title: Leviafan

fields.title: Philomena
fields.text: Biography, Comedy, Drama A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.

fields.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes

fields.title: El cuerpo

fields.title: Serbuan maut
fields.text: Action, Thriller A S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.

fields.title: End of Watch

fields.title: Kari-gurashi no Arietti
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Family The Clock family are four-inch-tall people who live anonymously in another family's residence, borrowing simple items to make their home. Life changes for the Clocks when their teenage daughter, Arrietty, is discovered.

fields.title: A Star Is Born
fields.text: Drama, Music, Romance A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

fields.title: True Grit
fields.text: Drama, Western A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

fields.title: Hævnen
fields.text: Drama, Romance The lives of two Danish families cross each other, and an extraordinary but risky friendship comes into bud. But loneliness, frailty and sorrow lie in wait.

fields.title: Despicable Me
fields.text: Animation, Comedy, Crime When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.
Comedy, Drama, Romance Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.

fields.title: Kick-Ass
fields.text: Action, Comedy, Crime Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

fields.title: Celda 211
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Crime The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

fields.title: La piel que habito
fields.text: Drama, Horror, Thriller A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

fields.title: Zombieland

fields.title: Die Welle
fields.text: Drama, Thriller A high school teacher's experiment to demonstrate to his students what life is like under a dictatorship spins horribly out of control when he forms a social unit with a life of its own.

fields.title: Sherlock Holmes

fields.title: The Blind Side
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Sport The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

fields.title: The Visitor

fields.title: Seven Pounds

fields.title: Eastern Promises
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama A teenager who dies during childbirth leaves clues in her journal that could tie her child to a rape involving a violent Russian mob family.

fields.title: Stardust

fields.title: The Secret of Kells

fields.title: Inside Man

fields.title: Gone Baby Gone

fields.title: La Vie En Rose

fields.title: Huo Yuan Jia
fields.text: Action, Biography, Drama A biography of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia, who is the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

fields.title: The Illusionist
fields.text: Drama, Fantasy, Mystery In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

fields.title: Dead Man's Shoes
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Family As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
Action, Drama King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

fields.title: Match Point
fields.text: Drama, Romance, Thriller At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for an actress who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

fields.title: Watchmen
fields.text: Action, Drama, Mystery In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

fields.title: Lord of War
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

fields.title: Saw
fields.text: Horror, Mystery, Thriller Two strangers awaken in a room with no recollection of how they got there, and soon discover they're pawns in a deadly game perpetrated by a notorious serial killer.

fields.title: Synecdoche, New York
fields.text: Drama A theatre director struggles with his work, and the women in his life, as he creates a life-size replica of New York City inside a warehouse as part of his new play.

fields.title: Mysterious Skin
fields.text: Drama A teenage hustler and a young man obsessed with alien abductions cross paths, together discovering a horrible, liberating truth.

fields.title: Jeux d'enfants
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance As adults, best friends Julien and Sophie continue the odd game they started as children -- a fearless competition to outdo one another with daring and outrageous stunts. While they often act out to relieve one another's pain, their game might be a way to avoid the fact that they are truly meant for one another.

fields.title: Un long dimanche de fiançailles
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Romance Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

fields.title: The Station Agent
fields.text: Comedy, Drama When his only friend dies, a man born with dwarfism moves to rural New Jersey to live a life of solitude, only to meet a chatty hot dog vendor and a woman dealing with her own personal loss.

fields.title: 21 Grams
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.

fields.title: Boksuneun naui geot
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller A recently laid off factory worker kidnaps his former boss' friend's daughter, hoping to use the ransom money to pay for his sister's kidney transplant.

fields.title: Finding Neverland
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Family The story of Sir J.M. Barrie's friendship with a family who inspired him to create Peter Pan.

fields.title: 25th Hour
fields.text: Drama Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.

fields.title: The Butterfly Effect
fields.text: Drama, Sci-Fi, Thriller Evan Treborn suffers blackouts during significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life by reading his journal.

fields.title: 28 Days Later...
fields.text: Drama, Horror, Sci-Fi Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

fields.title: Batoru rowaiaru
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Drama In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students and forces them to kill each other under the revolutionary "Battle Royale" act.

fields.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
fields.text: Comedy, Drama The eccentric members of a dysfunctional family reluctantly gather under the same roof for various reasons.

fields.title: Y tu mamá también
fields.text: Drama In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.

fields.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
fields.text: Adventure, Family, Fantasy An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

fields.title: The Others
fields.text: Horror, Mystery, Thriller A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

fields.title: Blow
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama The story of how George Jung, along with the Medellín Cartel headed by Pablo Escobar, established the American cocaine market in the 1970s in the United States.

fields.title: Enemy at the Gates
fields.text: Drama, History, War A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

fields.title: Minority Report
fields.text: Action, Crime, Mystery In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.

fields.title: The Hurricane
fields.text: Biography, Drama, Sport The story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.

fields.title: American Psycho
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

fields.title: Lola rennt
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller After a botched money delivery, Lola has 20 minutes to come up with 100,000 Deutschmarks.

fields.title: The Thin Red Line
fields.text: Drama, War Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

fields.title: Mulan
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Family To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

fields.title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Drama An oddball journalist and his psychopathic lawyer travel to Las Vegas for a series of psychedelic escapades.

fields.title: Funny Games
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.

fields.title: Dark City
fields.text: Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

fields.title: Sleepers
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller After a prank goes disastrously wrong, a group of boys are sent to a detention center where they are brutalized. Thirteen years later, an unexpected random encounter with a former guard gives them a chance for revenge.

fields.title: Lost Highway
fields.text: Mystery, Thriller Anonymous videotapes presage a musician's murder conviction, and a gangster's girlfriend leads a mechanic astray.

fields.title: Sense and Sensibility
fields.text: Drama, Romance Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the title opposites.

fields.title: Die Hard: With a Vengeance
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Thriller John McClane and a Harlem store owner are targeted by German terrorist Simon in New York City, where he plans to rob the Federal Reserve Building.

fields.title: Dead Man
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

fields.title: The Bridges of Madison County
fields.text: Drama, Romance Photographer Robert Kincaid wanders into the life of housewife Francesca Johnson for four days in the 1960s.

fields.title: Apollo 13
fields.text: Adventure, Drama, History NASA must devise a strategy to return Apollo 13 to Earth safely after the spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage putting the lives of the three astronauts on board in jeopardy.

fields.title: Trois couleurs: Blanc
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance After his wife divorces him, a Polish immigrant plots to get even with her.

fields.title: Falling Down
fields.text: Action, Crime, Drama An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

fields.title: Dazed and Confused
fields.text: Comedy The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.

fields.title: My Cousin Vinny
fields.text: Comedy, Crime Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.

fields.title: Omohide poro poro
fields.text: Animation, Drama, Romance A twenty-seven-year-old office worker travels to the countryside while reminiscing about her childhood in Tokyo.

fields.title: Delicatessen
fields.text: Comedy, Crime Post-apocalyptic surrealist black comedy about the landlord of an apartment building who occasionally prepares a delicacy for his odd tenants.

fields.title: Home Alone
fields.text: Comedy, Family An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

fields.title: The Godfather: Part III
fields.text: Crime, Drama Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.

fields.title: When Harry Met Sally...
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

fields.title: The Little Mermaid
fields.text: Animation, Family, Fantasy A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain in an attempt to become human and win a prince's love.

fields.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
fields.text: Comedy, Crime Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

fields.title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles
fields.text: Comedy, Drama A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving with a lovable oaf of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.

fields.title: Lethal Weapon
fields.text: Action, Crime, Thriller Two newly paired cops who are complete opposites must put aside their differences in order to catch a gang of drug smugglers.

fields.title: Blood Simple
fields.text: Crime, Drama, Thriller The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

fields.title: On Golden Pond
fields.text: Drama Norman is a curmudgeon with an estranged relationship with his daughter Chelsea. At Golden Pond, he and his wife nevertheless agree to care for Billy, the son of Chelsea's new boyfriend, and a most unexpected relationship blooms.

fields.title: Mad Max 2
fields.text: Action, Adventure, Sci-Fi In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

fields.title: The Warriors
fields.text: Action, Crime, Thriller In the near future, a charismatic leader summons the street gangs of New York City in a bid to take it over. When he is killed, The Warriors are falsely blamed and now must fight their way home while every other gang is hunting them down.

fields.title: The Muppet Movie
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, Family Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

fields.title: Escape from Alcatraz
fields.text: Action, Biography, Crime Alcatraz is the most secure prison of its time. It is believed that no one can ever escape from it, until three daring men make a possible successful attempt at escaping from one of the most infamous prisons in the world.

fields.title: Watership Down
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Drama Hoping to escape destruction by human developers and save their community, a colony of rabbits, led by Hazel and Fiver, seek out a safe place to set up a new warren.

fields.title: Midnight Express
fields.text: Biography, Crime, Drama Billy Hayes, an American college student, is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.

fields.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
fields.text: Drama, Sci-Fi Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.

fields.title: The Long Goodbye
fields.text: Comedy, Crime, Drama Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam, but in doing so gets implicated in his wife's murder.

fields.title: Giù la testa
fields.text: Drama, War, Western A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

fields.title: Kelly's Heroes
fields.text: Adventure, Comedy, War A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

fields.title: The Jungle Book
fields.text: Animation, Adventure, Family Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

fields.title: Blowup
fields.text: Drama, Mystery, Thriller A fashion photographer unknowingly captures a death on film after following two lovers in a park.

fields.title: A Hard Day's Night
fields.text: Comedy, Music, Musical Over two "typical" days in the life of The Beatles, the boys struggle to keep themselves and Sir Paul McCartney's mischievous grandfather in check while preparing for a live television performance.

fields.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
fields.text: Comedy, Drama, Romance A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

fields.title: Giant
fields.text: Drama, Western Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

fields.title: From Here to Eternity
fields.text: Drama, Romance, War In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

fields.title: Lifeboat
fields.text: Drama, War Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the crew members of the U-boat that sank their ship.

fields.title: The 39 Steps
fields.text: Crime, Mystery, Thriller A man in London tries to help a counter-espionage Agent. But when the Agent is killed, and the man stands accused, he must go on the run to save himself and stop a spy ring which is trying to steal top secret information.
